bug.author: tankienleong
bug.description: In openvino 2020.3, there is libgstwebrtc.so and libgstwebrtcdsp.so inside /opt/intel/openvino/data_processing/gstreamer/lib/gstreamer-1.0/ directory but this two files does not come with openvino 2021.1

comments.comment: Luckily the gstreamer version used by openvino 2020.3 and openvino 2021.1 are the same (version 1.16) so I just copy paste the libgstwebrtc.so and libgstwebrtcdsp.so and it works.
